Class HiddenLinkageTreeLogger

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.loggers.MCLogger

All Implemented Interfaces:
Logger
public class HiddenLinkageTreeLogger
extends TreeLogger

Author:
Aaron Darling (koadman) This class logs hidden linkage trees It modifies a tree to add nodes for metagenomic reads according to a hidden linkage model
